Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: http://www.skotos.net/IronclawGame/images/maps/trisk.jpg
a steeply sloping stretch of cave above an underground pool

The upper portion of this section of cave is tight and narrow, barely more than a crevice between giant boulders. The rocks appear to have recently moved into place, many of the boulders still loose and precariously perched atop one another. Below this, the space opens up surrounding an underground body of water surrounded by a rocky gravel bank. A green glow emanates from a narrow gap at the bottom of the pool. A narrow crevice leads upward through some boulders.

The upper portion of this section of cave is tight and narrow, barely more than a crevice between giant boulders. The rocks appear to have recently moved into place, many of the boulders still loose and precariously perched atop one another. Below this, the space opens up surrounding an underground body of water surrounded by a rocky gravel bank. A myriad of glistening white stalactites hang from the ceiling, some long enough to join with stalagmites sticking up above the surface of the water. Droplets fall from the ceiling above, constantly rippling the surface of the underground pool. A green glow emanates from a narrow gap at the bottom of the pool. A narrow crevice leads upward through some boulders.
http://i.imgur.com/yQ5GMdN.png
a narrow passage at the bottom of the pool
A narrow passage can be seen at the bottom of the pool of water.
You emerge on the other side of the underwater passage and head upward, breaking through the surface of the water with a gasp.
emerges through the passage at the bottom of the pool, {$(actor.base:pronoun) |$(actor.base:pronoun)} swims upward and breaks the surface of the water with a gasp.
takes a deep breath and dives to the bottom of the pool before disappearing through the passage below.
a narrow crevice leading upward
A narrow crevice leads upward through the jumbled rocks.
the sloping bank of the underground pool
The gravel covered stone bank of the underground pool slopes gently downward to where it meets with the surface of the water.
$(this.trait:boulder) boulder
A $(this.trait:boulder) boulder lies nearby.
the multiple boulders strewn around the area
Many boulders of varying sizes are strewn about the area in chaotic formation.
the rocky ceiling overhead
The ceiling overhead.
The ceiling overhead is rocky and moist, drops of water occasionally falling down from above.
the chill that permeates the air
The air is still and unmoving, but the chill that permeates it is damp and cold.
the northeast corner
The northeast corner of the room.
The northeast corner of the room.
the northwest corner
The northwest corner of the room.
The northwest corner of the room.
the southeast corner
The southeast corner of the room.
The southeast corner of the room.
the southwest corner
The southwest corner of the room.
The southwest corner of the room.
the corners
The corners of the room.
The corners of the room.
the dampness
The air is damp, water dripping from every surface and making the ground slick.
the darkness surrounding you
Darkness threatens from all sides, lingering on the outskirts of the dim aura of the lights.
the droplets of water continually falling from the ceiling

Droplets of water hang pregnant and large from the ceiling overhead before gravity takes over and sends it falling to the ground below, occasionally atop the heads of those daring to traverse the caves.
the echo
Sounds echo through the caves, reverberating off the stone walls and confusing your senses.
the loose pebbles covering the path
Loose pebbles covering the path makes the travel difficult and treacherous.
the craggy ground
The ground surrounding the path is craggy and covered in boulders of every size.
the middle of the room
The middle of the room.
The middle of the room.
the treacherously slick and rocky path
A path winds through the caves, treacherously slick and strewn with ( gravel \| stones \| pebbles ).
the large underground pool of water

The underground pool of water is large and crystal clear. The surface of the water is rippled by the droplets falling from above. Stalagmites grow up from the bottom, reaching above the surface to occasionally join with the stalagmites above.
the ripples on the surface of the water
Droplets of water from the ceiling regularly fall downward, causing ripples to radiate outward over the surface of the underground pool.
the dancing shadows all around
Shadows dance eerily up and down the walls, moving in sporadic patterns in the dim light.
the eerie sounds filling the area
You cannot see the sounds or that which causes them, but all around you, various undefinable noises permeate the caves, echoing off the walls with chaotic cacophony.
the long slender stalactites

Long, slender stalactites hang down from the ceiling, shimmering white and glinting in the low light. Some are so long that they have joined with the slender stalagmites growing up from within the underground pool.
the tall, narrow stalagmites

Tall, narrow stalagmites growing up from the cave floor and from within the underground pool, glittering white in the low light. Some are tall enough that they have joined with the stalactites hanging down from the ceiling.
the surface of the water
The surface of the underground pool is decorated regularly with ripples from the droplets of water falling from above.
the eastern wall
The eastern wall.
The eastern wall.
the northern wall
The northern wall.
The northern wall.
the southern wall
The southern wall.
The southern wall.
the western wall
The western wall.
The western wall.
the walls
There are walls surrounding the room.
There are walls surrounding the room.
the crystalline water in the pool
The pool is filled with clear, crystalline water.

Core:Properties.Core:Property: X[S] \{ Droplets of water fall regularly from the ceiling overhead, the soft plop echoing hollowly through the space. \| A small shuffling sound can be heard in the distance, but the acoustics confuse your sense of where the sound came from. \| The air is still and cold, the damp chill permeating the area. \| You can hear the cascade of a few pebbles in the distance. \| And undefinable moaning sound echos through the area from somewhere further down in the caverns. \| Complete silence greets you in the pause between your breaths, the looming cave and weight of the earth above you pressing down. \| A distance shifting of a small stone indicates that you are not alone in this cave. \| You can hear the cascade of a few pebbles in the distance. \| And undefinable moaning sound echos through the area from somewhere further down in the caverns. \| An eerie cold fills the air, chilling you to your bones. \| Rustling and the cascade of small pebbles echoes from the distance, reminding you that you are not along here. \| A soft \{ whistling \| groaning \| moaning \| croaking \| growling \| muttering \} sound echoes from somewhere in the dark distance beyond. \| The incessant dripping sound echoes throughout the area, almost perpetual in it's cadence. \| Ripples routinely break the surface of the water. \| The rippling waters reflect the stalactites in distorted waves. \| The water dripping into the pool causes ripples to decorate the otherwise still surface. \}
X[M] EmitIn(\$this, "You catch the muffled sound of the evening bell."); return TRUE;
X[M] EmitIn(\$this, "The deep sound of midday bells is heard from outside."); return TRUE;
X[M] EmitIn(\$this, "Outside, the bells announce midnight."); return TRUE;
X[M] EmitIn(\$this, "The church bells herald the morning."); return TRUE;

X[S] \{ Droplets of water fall regularly from the ceiling overhead, the soft plop echoing hollowly through the space. \| A small shuffling sound can be heard in the distance, but the acoustics confuse your sense of where the sound came from. \| The air is still and cold, the damp chill permeating the area. \| You can hear the cascade of a few pebbles in the distance. \| And undefinable moaning sound echos through the area from somewhere further down in the caverns. \| Complete silence greets you in the pause between your breaths, the looming cave and weight of the earth above you pressing down. \| A distance shifting of a small stone indicates that you are not alone in this cave. \| You can hear the cascade of a few pebbles in the distance. \| And undefinable moaning sound echos through the area from somewhere further down in the caverns. \| An eerie cold fills the air, chilling you to your bones. \| Rustling and the cascade of small pebbles echoes from the distance, reminding you that you are not along here. \| A soft \{ whistling \| groaning \| moaning \| croaking \| growling \| muttering \} sound echoes from somewhere in the dark distance beyond. \| The incessant dripping sound echoes throughout the area, almost perpetual in it's cadence. \| Ripples routinely break the surface of the water. \| The rippling waters reflect the stalactites in distorted waves. \| The water dripping into the pool causes ripples to decorate the otherwise still surface. \}
